Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for you. Considering its worth to us and its relevance to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for this product. We're confident that this offer not only provides you with significant savings but also ensures that you receive a high-quality item that will serve you well. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
